QuestData.Title: Deteriorating Knowledge
QuestData.Description:
My clan came to Nazjatar, eager to destroy the naga queen.
We were not prepared for the darkness that she commands.
Our scouts knew this land best, but their knowledge now deteriorates as their minds are controlled by Azshara's forces.
Find and free our scouts, and you may still have a chance to access their knowledge.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Imara, Adaru, and Umai from the clutches of mind-leeching Zoatroids.
